title: Thinking Fast and Slow - author concludes passage

content.question: In the final paragraph, the author concludes the passage by discussing

choices.label: a peer review that confirms how influential he is among psychologists
an application of his research in other fields and subject areas
a concept that indicates the direction of new research in his field
a case study that shows the consequences of avoiding intuitive judgments

content.answer: a concept that indicates the direction of new research in his field

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
